fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1

Class CVMIntegrationTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.CVMIntegrationTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI

    public class CVMIntegrationTest
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
    The class CVMIntegrationTest defines the integration test for the household energy management example.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       CLOCK_URI != null && !CLOCK_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       DELAY_TO_START_IN_MILLIS >= 0
 invariant       ACCELERATION_FACTOR > 0.0
 invariant       START_INSTANT != null

    Created on : 2021-09-10

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double ACCELERATION_FACTOR
      for real time simulations, the acceleration factor applied to the the simulated time to get the execution time of the simulations.
      static java.lang.String CLOCK_URI
      for integration tests, a Clock is used to get a time-triggered synchronisation of the actions of the components in the test scenarios.
      static long DELAY_TO_START_IN_MILLIS
      delay before starting the test scenarios, leaving time to build and initialise the components and their simulators.
      static int NB_OF_SQUARE_METERS
      number of square meters in the test solar panel.
      static java.time.Instant START_INSTANT
      start instant in test scenarios, as a string to be parsed.
